title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Mike Azevedo
raw_text: Skip to content Issue 60 – September 2011 Cover Art Forest Spirit Mike Azevedo is an 18-year-old Brazilian student who works mainly with games and animation. He loves painting and believes that commitment and knowing the importance of failing are the most important qualities an artist can have. Skip to content
Issue 60 – September 2011
Cover Art
Forest Spirit
Mike Azevedo is an 18-year-old Brazilian student who works mainly with games and animation. He loves painting and believes that commitment and knowing the importance of failing are the most important qualities an artist can have.
ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
